page.title: 13DORRINGTON TALES (CONT)
page.content:
DORRINGTON CHURCH TALES CONTD. WOOD ELVES IN DORRINGTON. In Dorrington there used to be some oak trees.In each oak tree there lived a wood elf.Every night each wood elf would come out and move the church marker stones.Every time a wood elf moved a marker he would lose his magic.He would then go back to his tree and die.The tree would also die with him.Eventually there was just one wood elf and one oak tree left.The people who were going to build the church didn't know who kept on moving the markers. They got so fed up with putting them backback that they decided to build the church where the wood elves had moved the markers to.
By BARRY MITCHELL - age 11
